Parameter.Name: CTS_LOCAL_PATH
Parameter.Description: Specify path/url to android CTS framework

Parameter.Name: TEST_CMD_LINES
Parameter.Description: Test cmd lines to execute. Separate with ';' if more than one.

Parameter.Name: TEST_FAILED_RETRY_NO
Parameter.Description: Number of times to rerun the failed cts test.

Parameter.Name: CTS_REPORT_COMPARISON_PATH
Parameter.Description: Specify path/url to a previous CTS result. Verdict will be built according to this one
